pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: The Sandra & Gary Baden Collection of Celebrity Endorsements in Advertising, ca.1897-1979
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: A wide-ranging collection of over 1,000 celebrity advertising endorsements culled from high-end magazines. Includes radio personalities such as Jack Benny, Bing Crosby, Fred Allen, Jack Webb, Bob Hope and others as well as advertisements that involve radios or radio stations. See online finding aid for list of personalities and products.
